serviceTerms.title: Terms of Service
serviceTerms.content:
Lightning Pickleball Terms of Service

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
Lightning Pickleball is a platform that connects pickleball players. Responsibility for safety incidents or disputes during actual matches lies with the participants, and we do not assume legal liability for these matters.

1. Service Usage
- This app is a platform service connecting pickleball players.
- Users can utilize features such as match creation, participation, and club activities.
- Please maintain mutual respect and sportsmanship when using the service.

2. User Obligations
- Must provide accurate information.
- Must not infringe on others' rights.
- Must not post illegal or inappropriate content.

3. AI Chatbot Service Terms
3.1 AI Answer Limitations (Disclaimer)
- Pickleball-related information provided by the chatbot is generated by AI.
- Information provided by AI may be inaccurate or outdated.
- The company does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of AI chatbot information.
- The company is not liable for any damages arising from AI chatbot information.

3.2 User Conduct Rules
- Prohibited to use the chatbot to generate or ask illegal content.
- Prohibited to generate or ask offensive or discriminatory content.
- Prohibited to generate or ask content that infringes on others' rights.
- Prohibited to intentionally share personal or sensitive information.

3.3 Service Changes and Discontinuation
- The company may change AI chatbot functionality at any time.
- The company may temporarily or permanently discontinue chatbot service for technical or operational reasons.
- The company is not liable for damages from service changes or discontinuation.

4. Service Provider Rights
- May update the service for quality improvement.
- May take disciplinary action against inappropriate users.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
Privacy Policy

1. Personal Information We Collect
- Basic info: Nickname, gender, age range
- Pickleball info: NTRP level, preferred playing style
- Location info: Activity areas, GPS location (for match finding)
- Contact info: Email address
- AI Chatbot conversation data: User questions and conversation logs

2. Purpose of Personal Information Use
- Providing matchmaking services
- Providing personalized recommendations
- Supporting user communication
- Service improvement and statistical analysis
- AI Chatbot service: Generate responses to user questions
- Chatbot service quality improvement and user inquiry trend analysis

3. Third-Party Information Sharing (Important)
3.1 Google AI Service Integration
- User conversation content is transmitted to Google (Alphabet Inc.) for AI chatbot response generation.
- Google processes this data solely for generating responses through AI models (Gemini).
- Google Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Users may opt out of AI chatbot features without limiting other service usage.

3.2 Third-Party Sharing Protections
- Personal identifying information is minimized before transmission.
- Data is securely transmitted through encrypted communication.

4. Data Storage Period
- Basic personal information: Stored during service usage period
- AI chatbot conversation logs: Stored for up to 2 years for service improvement, then automatically deleted
- All personal information immediately deleted upon account withdrawal (except for legal retention requirements)

5. Personal Information Protection and User Rights
- Collected personal information is encrypted and securely stored
- Users may request cessation of personal information processing at any time
- Users may request access, correction, or deletion of personal information

‚ö†Ô∏è 6. Personal Information Security Disclaimer (Important)
- In the event of personal information leakage due to hacking, malware, system errors, or other external attacks or program errors, the company is not legally liable.
- Users are advised NOT to expose or store sensitive personal information such as social security numbers, financial information, or passwords within the app.
- The company is not responsible for damages arising from entering sensitive information in profiles, posts, chats, etc.
- Users are encouraged to use strong passwords and change them periodically for account security.

locationServices.title: Location-Based Services Terms
locationServices.content:
Location-Based Services Terms

1. Location Information Collection and Use
- Providing nearby match finding services
- Providing pickleball court search services
- Providing distance-based notification services

2. Consent for Location Information
- Users may refuse location information provision at any time
- Refusing location information may limit some service features

3. Location Information Protection
- Collected location information is encrypted and securely stored
- Not provided to third parties without user consent

liabilityDisclaimer.title: Liability Disclaimer
liabilityDisclaimer.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT LEGAL NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è

Lightning Pickleball app serves as a platform to connect individual pickleball players.

WE DO NOT ASSUME ANY LEGAL LIABILITY for:

1. Safety Incidents Disclaimer
- Injuries or accidents during pickleball matches
- Personal disputes between match participants
- Safety incidents at pickleball court facilities

2. Financial Disputes Disclaimer
- Disputes related to match costs
- Issues related to court rental fees
- Financial transactions between users

3. User Responsibility
- All safety and responsibility for matches belong to hosts and participants
- Users must verify their health condition before participating
- Appropriate insurance coverage is recommended

By using this service, you agree to these disclaimer terms.

marketingCommunications.title: Marketing Communications Consent
marketingCommunications.content:
Marketing Communications Consent (Optional)

1. Content
- New features and service updates
- Special events and promotion announcements
- Useful pickleball-related information and tips
- Partnership benefits and discount information

2. Delivery Methods
- Push notifications
- Email
- In-app notifications

3. Opt-out
- You can opt-out anytime in settings
- Selective opt-out available for individual notifications

This consent is optional and refusing won't limit your service usage.

whatIsLtr.title: What is LPR?
whatIsLtr.content: LPR (Lightning Pickleball Rating) is a proprietary skill assessment system developed exclusively for the Lightning Pickleball community. LPR is calculated based on the ELO algorithm applied to all public lightning match results, showing your growth journey in an intuitive scale from 1 to 10. It's an honorable indicator of how much you've grown within our ecosystem.

relationToNtrp.title: Relationship to NTRP
relationToNtrp.content: LPR is a unique system distinct from USTA's NTRP. For the convenience of users familiar with NTRP ratings, you can select your skill level in a range similar to NTRP when signing up, but all official levels calculated and displayed within the app are based on LPR.
